DeepAnalysis::HitGroup

DeepAnalysis::HitGroup Class Reference

This class is not a cluster, but this is as it said in name -- Group of Hits, that has a boundaries in 3-D cartesian coordinate system and spherical coordinate system, center of gravity and whole energy. More...

Detailed Description

This class is not a cluster, but this is as it said in name -- Group of Hits, that has a boundaries in 3-D cartesian coordinate system and spherical coordinate system, center of gravity and whole energy.
